actors
Class Being

java.lang.Object
  actors.Being
All Implemented Interfaces:
Lifeform, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster, PC
public abstract class Being
extends java.lang.Object
implements Lifeform, java.io.Serializable

A representation of the Monster's and PC's in the Game. Both monster's and PC's will extend from this object type. It provides most of their shared functionality, and then the monster's and PC's extend to add on the specific functionality that they need.

Author:
Gladdos
See Also:
Serialized Form
